2_1DzpF7398yNGjFwHQqHAu9fRkbE3WZ6dZA.body:
> [rythyrix](#comment_103_18eGWSaM3Vc9i61LVfogjQJf5gp7EN7b9Y): The --proxy option enables ZeroNet to connect via a SOCKS5 proxy, if you need a non-Tor option. Otherwise, try running the Tor Browser, then starting ZeroNet with the following command line options: --tor always --tor_proxy 127.0.0.1:9150 --tor_controller 127.0.0.1:9151. These options can be made permanent; modify your ZeroBundle\ZeroNet\zeronet.conf file by making a backup, then adding the following lines to it: [...]

right!,but don't tell he ,he is big pig.
